flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=740>>740 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 740 followers / 2 = <<740/2=370>>370 followers on Twitter.
He has 370 followers x 3 = <<370*3=1101>>1101 followers on Tiktok.
He has 1101 followers + 510 followers = <<1101+510=1611>>1611 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 740 followers + 370 followers + 1101 followers + 1611 followers = <<740+370+1101+1611=3822>>3822 followers on social media.
#### 3822

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1110, not 1101. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
